caption.p: Current habitat suitability areas (in green) for the argali in eastern Tajikistan using climatic and nonclimatic variables in the models: (a) BRT, boosted regression tree, (b) GLM, generalized linear model, (c) MARS, multivariate adaptive regression splines, (d) Maxent, (e) RF, Random Forest, and (f) suitable area based on the agreement of at least three ENMs. Gray lines depict the contours in the region. The darker the lines, the higher the elevation
